articles.description: Novavax Inc. has shipped the first doses of its Covid-19 vaccine to Europe, marking the drug company's entry into a potentially large new market. He calls th...

articles.title: First round of US-Russia security talks ends amid war fears - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Russia is insisting on legally-binding guarantees of a halt to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization enlargement and an end to the alliance’s military presence in eastern and central European nations that joined the bloc since 1997. | World News
articles.content: Diplomats from Russia and the US wrapped up their first round of high-stakes talks over the Kremlins sweeping security demands amid the threat of a Russian invasion of Ukraine thats provoked the wors… [+2630 chars]

articles.author: Lyubov Pronina
articles.title: EU countries agree to lift South African travel ban - News24
articles.description: European Union member states have agreed to lift the air travel ban on southern African countries, which will allow more travel to resume.
